Hello all !

This new version adds support for GridBagLayout, struts and glue.  There is
also a basic implementation of border handling.

I would like people to tell me how they would want the border to be
implemented.  What kind of XML code would you like to see ?

This new version runs under JDK 1.3.1 and JDK 1.4.0.

Read the news at:
http://sourceforge.net/forum/forum.php?forum_id=185442

Download JGB 0.3.1a at:
http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=50316&release_id=94432

Thanks !

=====
Francois Beausoleil
Java Gui Builder - http://jgb.sourceforge.net/
